tool_description: Generates specific fertilizer recommendations including product types, application rates, and timing based on soil test results, crop requirements, and nutrient deficiencies.

current_nutrient_levels.description: Current soil nutrient concentrations in ppm

target_nutrient_levels.description: Target nutrient concentrations for optimal growth

application_method.description: Preferred application method (broadcast, banded, foliar, fertigation)

budget_constraint.description: Maximum budget for fertilization per acre

soil_ph.description: Current soil pH for fertilizer selection

error_messages: Mismatched nutrient arrays: deficient_nutrients, current_nutrient_levels, and target_nutrient_levels must have the same length.
Invalid nutrient levels: All nutrient concentrations must be non-negative numbers.
Invalid field area: Field area must be greater than 0 acres.
Unsupported application method: Use broadcast, banded, foliar, or fertigation.
Invalid budget constraint: Budget must be a positive number if specified.
Invalid pH value: Soil pH must be between 3.0 and 10.0.
usage: Provide arrays of deficient_nutrients, current_nutrient_levels, and target_nutrient_levels of equal length, plus crop_type and field_area. Customize with application_method, budget_constraint, organic_preference, and soil_ph.

fertilizer_products.description: Recommended fertilizer products with NPK ratios

application_rates.description: Application rates in lbs per acre for each product

total_cost_per_acre.description: Estimated total fertilizer cost per acre

nutrient_balance.description: Assessment of nutrient balance after fertilization
